review: Love it!!!!! It is so easy to setup up and use its just like having your kindle in a bigger screen
author: maria stealey

review: Does the job well. Can now get and manage Netflix on my older Sony LED TV.
author: CK in Ames

review: Everything I expected and more. The remote control is a big bonus and makes it very easy to scroll through the menus. The only complaint if any is the remote is so small it's easy to misplace.
author: Kenneth Siegel

review: Pros: Fast, responsive, small footprint.Cons: Always on
author: Erik

review: Worked as expected. Not a whole lot different from the other streaming hardware out there but works smoothly and could not beat the Prime pricing.
author: Shaggy

review: Fantastic when it works. A lot of buffering....
author: Lisa Bradley
